onSuccess.displayText:
Making his way to the Royal Historian, one of the most respected figures in the castle, second only to the royal family, {Player} was greeted with polite surprise and a flurry of bowing attendants. The historian, {HistorianName}, listened intently as {Player} explained his purpose. Though details of that night had long faded into rumor, the scholar recalled one crucial fact: the Queen’s fateful stroll had taken place deep within {Forest1}, near the outskirts of {VillageName}. Records of that region were scarce, and few dared venture there since. 

Thanking the historian, {Player} felt a faint spark of direction, his path was finally beginning to take shape. Another thought flashed into his mind: the Captain of the Royal Guard had been part of his mother’s escort that day. Perhaps he could provide further insight… or he could make haste for {VillageName}.
choices: Talk to the Captain of the Royal Guard
